world

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • world.Sprite
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, Mine, Obstacle, Projectile, Shield

    public abstract class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    The sprite class represents an entity of a given World.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Robert, Dalton, Brian, Derek
    See Also:
    World

      • Sprite

        public Sprite(Vector2 size,
              Vector2 position,
              Vector2 velocity,
              Vector2 acceleration,
              java.awt.Color color,
              World world)
        6-Argument Sprite Constructor.
        Parameters:
        size - the size
        position - position vector
        velocity - rate of change in position vector
        acceleration - rate of change in rate of change of position / rate of change in velocity / acceleration vector
        color - color
        world - plane of existence
